Package heccCeptions

package heccCeptions
Like exceptions, but for hecc instead.

I see an opportunity to make a bad pun, I take the opportunity to make a bad pun.

Author:
Rachel Lowe
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    DeletedLinkPresentException
    An exception that will get thrown if a passage still contains a link to a deleted passage.
    DuplicatePassageNameException
    exception for when passages share names
    EmptyPassageException
    exception for when a passage has no content
    HeccCeption
    standard HECC exception
    InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
    A HeccCeption for invalid metadata declarations (to be thrown when a user attempts to give invalid metadata when editing it via OH-HECC)
    InvalidPassageNameException
    exception for when a passage has an invalid name
    MissingStartingPassageException
    exception for when the specified start passage doesn't actually exist
    NoMatchException
    Exception used by the Metadata regex stuff, thrown if the matcher doesn't match anything
    NoPassagesException
    exception for when there are no passages in the .hecc file
    UndefinedPassageException
    exception used when an undefined passage is linked
